price: خبر شئ چې بې شکه د الله په دوستانو هېڅ قسم ویره نشته او نه به دوی غمجن شي.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: alā inna awliyāa al-lahi lā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
